fields.name: Illiteracy (Passive):
fields.value: The person with this role is not allowed to use any coherent words during the game.

fields.name: Cry (x1):
fields.value: (A town member comes to comfort them) When used, can take the defense power of any alive person for a round. Must be used in a neighborhood chat.

fields.name: Amber Alert (Passive):
fields.value: If attacked, the voting power of every member of Town doubles.
